de.rwth.i2.attestor.graph.heap

Interface HeapConfigurationBuilder

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    InternalHeapConfigurationBuilder

    public interface HeapConfigurationBuilder

    A HeapConfigurationBuilder allows to mutate a given HeapConfiguration. Hence, as long as a HeapConfigurationBuilder exists for a HeapConfiguration, the HeapConfiguration is mutable. It is set to an immutable HeapConfiguration again by calling build().

    There is always at most one HeapConfigurationBuilder for each HeapConfiguration.

    Author:
    Christoph

    • Method Detail

      • build

        HeapConfiguration build()
        Marks the underlying HeapConfiguration as immutable again (until a new builder is requested). This method also removes the current builder. It may additionally optimize the internal structure of a HeapConfiguration before making it immutable.
        Returns:
        The underlying HeapConfiguration

      • addNodes

        HeapConfigurationBuilder addNodes(Type type,
                                  int count,
                                  gnu.trove.list.array.TIntArrayList buffer)
        Add count nodes of Type type to the underlying graph. The IDs of the added nodes are stored in the provided buffer.
        Parameters:
        type - Type of the nodes to be created.
        count - The number of nodes to be created.
        buffer - A list in which all created nodes are added.
        Returns:
        The originally used HeapConfigurationBuilder.

      • removeIsolatedNode

        HeapConfigurationBuilder removeIsolatedNode(int node)
        Removes an isolated node from the underlying HeapConfiguration
        Parameters:
        node - ID of the node to remove
        Returns:
        the builder

      • addSelector

        HeapConfigurationBuilder addSelector(int from,
                                     SelectorLabel sel,
                                     int to)
        Adds a new selector edge that is labeled with 'sel' and points from node 'from' to node 'to'.
        Parameters:
        from - source of the selector edge
        sel - label of the selector edge
        to - target of the selector edge
        Returns:
        the builder

      • removeSelector

        HeapConfigurationBuilder removeSelector(int node,
                                        SelectorLabel sel)
        Removes an outgoing selector edge with the provided label 'sel' from the node 'node'. Nothing happens if the selector does not exist.
        Parameters:
        node - The node whose selector edges are taken into account.
        sel - The label of the selector edge that should be deleted.
        Returns:
        the builder

      • replaceSelector

        HeapConfigurationBuilder replaceSelector(int node,
                                         SelectorLabel oldSel,
                                         SelectorLabel newSel)
        Replaces the original label of an outgoing selector edge with label 'oldSel' of node 'node' by the selector label 'newSel'. Nothing happens if no such selector edge exists.
        Parameters:
        node - The node whose selector edges are taken into account.
        oldSel - The original label of the selector edge to be replaced.
        newSel - The new label of the selector edge to be replaced.
        Returns:
        the builder

        HeapConfigurationBuilder setExternal(int node)
        Marks a node as external.
        Parameters:
        node - The (not external yet) not to mark.
        Returns:
        the builder

        HeapConfigurationBuilder unsetExternal(int node)
        Marks an external node as not external.
        Parameters:
        node - The external node.
        Returns:
        the builder

        HeapConfigurationBuilder addVariableEdge(String name,
                                         int target)
        Adds a new, not already existing, variable edge and attaches it to the given target node.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the new variable.
        target - The node the new variable edge is attached to.

      • addNonterminalEdge

        HeapConfigurationBuilder addNonterminalEdge(Nonterminal label,
                                            gnu.trove.list.array.TIntArrayList attachedNodes)
        Adds a new nonterminal edge.
        Parameters:
        label - The label of the new edge.
        attachedNodes - The list of nodes attached to the new edge. The size of this list must coincide with the rank of label.
        Returns:
        the builder

      • addNonterminalEdge

        NonterminalEdgeBuilder addNonterminalEdge(Nonterminal nt)
        gets a nonterminalEdgeBuilder that allows to specify the tentacles of this nonterminal and add the resulting edge to the graph
        Parameters:
        nt - the nonterminal
        Returns:
        a builder for the given nonterminal and graph

      • removeNonterminalEdge

        HeapConfigurationBuilder removeNonterminalEdge(int ntEdge)
        Removes a given nonterminal edge.
        Parameters:
        ntEdge - The nonterminal edge to remove.
        Returns:
        the builder

      • replaceNonterminal

        HeapConfigurationBuilder replaceNonterminal(int ntEdge,
                                            Nonterminal newNt)
        Substitutes the label of a given nonterminal edge by the provided label. The rank of the new label has to coincide with the rank of the original label.
        Parameters:
        ntEdge - The nonterminal edge whose label should be changed.
        newNt - The new nonterminal label.
        Returns:
        the builder

      • replaceNonterminalEdge

        HeapConfigurationBuilder replaceNonterminalEdge(int ntEdge,
                                                HeapConfiguration replacement)
        Performs hyperedge replacement for the given nonterminal edge and the given HeapConfiguration. The rank of ntEdge, i.e. the number of nodes attached to it, and the number of external nodes of replacement have to coincide.
        Parameters:
        ntEdge - The nonterminal edge that should be replaced.
        replacement - The HeapConfiguration that should replace the hyperedge.
        Returns:
        the builder

      • replaceMatching

        HeapConfigurationBuilder replaceMatching(Matching matching,
                                         Nonterminal nonterminal)
        Replaces the graph captured by the provided matching by a fresh nonterminal edge labeled with the provided nonterminal. The rank of the nonterminal and the number of external nodes of the pattern graph contained in the matching
        Parameters:
        matching - A matching of a pattern graph in the current graph.
        nonterminal - The label of the nonterminal edge to be created.
        Returns:
        the builder

      • replaceNodeType

        HeapConfigurationBuilder replaceNodeType(int node,
                                         Type newType)
        Sets the node type of the given node to newType.
        Parameters:
        node - The node whose type should be changed.
        newType - The new type assigned to the node.
        Returns:
        the builder
